titles.title: Honoring the 40th anniversary of the incorporation of the city of Carson, California, and recognizing the city for its rich contributions to California history.
Honoring the 40th anniversary of the incorporation of the city of Carson, California, and recognizing the city for its rich contributions to California history.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary: Recognizes the 40th anniversary of the incorporation of the city of Carson, California.
